about_the_game:
As requested by some, and for others who are interested, here is a cheap DLC either if you want to bind Carpe Diem into your account or to show your appreciation and support. This is an extra package including high-definition contents of the visual novel such as background images, OSTs and character sprites; as well as a few extra, a special chibi Ai artwork including its .sai file, and two Live2D gifs.

The package, when downloaded, can be found inside the Carpe Diem folder named 'extra-package'.

I cannot express how much I appreciate your support. Thank you for reading Carpe Diem and have a great day!
detailed_description:
As requested by some, and for others who are interested, here is a cheap DLC either if you want to bind Carpe Diem into your account or to show your appreciation and support. This is an extra package including high-definition contents of the visual novel such as background images, OSTs and character sprites; as well as a few extra, a special chibi Ai artwork including its .sai file, and two Live2D gifs.

The package, when downloaded, can be found inside the Carpe Diem folder named 'extra-package'.

I cannot express how much I appreciate your support. Thank you for reading Carpe Diem and have a great day!

  • Storage: 29 MB available space

short_description: Includes character sprites (2500x5000), background images (1920x1080), OSTs, an original chibi Ai artwork, and a few other extra images.
